CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Express Couriers relative to Drone Delivery?
SRP.A: Express Couriers is {below} Drone Delivery in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Express Couriers}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Drone Delivery}.

VE.Q: What is Express Couriers's Delivery Time in 2001?
VE.A: Express Couriers's delivery time in 2001 is {2.29} days.

VE.Q: What is Express Couriers's Delivery Time in 1995?
VE.A: Express Couriers's delivery time in 1995 is {2.78} days.

VE.Q: What is Express Couriers's Delivery Time in 2009?
VE.A: Express Couriers's delivery time in 2009 is {3.16} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum delivery time is {0.10} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum delivery time is {3.16} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Delivery Time level recorded for Drone Delivery?
EVJ.A: Drone Delivery reached approximately {2.50} days in {1993}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Delivery Time level recorded for Drone Delivery?
EVJ.A: Drone Delivery's lowest recorded level is approximately {0.10} days in {2016}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Delivery Time?
SC.A: The average total delivery time is {3.43} days.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Delivery Time exceed 3.78 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time go below 2.92 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time fall between 3.18 and 3.52 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 1995, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 2013 and 2017?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1994 and 1995 was {smaller} than between 2013 and 2017.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 1999, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1994 and 2002?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1996 and 1999 was {smaller} than between 1994 and 2002.

NC.Q: Between 1995 and 1997, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 2000 and 2014?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1995 and 1997 was {larger} than between 2000 and 2014.

NC.Q: Between 1995 and 2011, was the average total Delivery Time higher or lower than between 2004 and 2014?
NC.A: The average total delivery time between 1995 and 2011 was {higher} than between 2004 and 2014.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Express Couriers} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Drone Delivery, Express Couriers}.
